titles.title: SNAP BACK Act of 2025
SNAP BACK Act of 2025
Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program Benefits And Compensation for Keep-up Act of 2025
A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to reimburse State agencies for costs incurred in carrying out the supplemental nutrition assistance program during a lapse in appropriations.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.
